body:
Take a look! 

> > > https://m.youtube.com/watch?v=78A09AIIMo8 < < <


it looks exactly like the avicus hub! 
Notice in one part of the video, it says on a sign, "made by hyperscale"


what is this? Can any of the staff help explain this?



Cheers! :D

title: What?!?!

replies.body: Yeah. Wow. I smelt Bullsh*t when I saw the floor.

replies.body: I remember from an old post from the broken roller coaster place I saw a work in progress lobby, howsie said it was never finished by hyperscale, I believe he made the lobby for us too, he is also an avicus user

replies.body: The lobby, as well as the maps mystic, fantasy a  few others were made by hyperscale. The lobby was simple taken from here using world downloader or another similar program to use on a private server. Not that much of a big deal
